sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz criticized Trump-era trade policies toward Beijing in an interview on Chinese state TV.
author: Chuck Ross
title: Dr. Oz Criticized Trump’s China Trade Policy in Interview With CCP Media

sentence: Oz has made millions of dollars in China from his television show and his health sponsorship deals WFB: Dr. Mehmet Oz criticized Trump-era trade policies toward Beijing in an interview on Chinese state TV.
author: MJA
title: Dr. Oz Criticized Trump’s China Trade Policy in Interview With CCP Media

sentence: Dr. Mehmet Oz coauthored a book touting the benefits of traditional Chinese medicine with the head of a Beijing university controlled by the Chinese Communist Party.
author: Chuck Ross
title: Dr. Oz Promoted Controversial Medicine in Book Written With CCP-Backed Academic

sentence: Celebrity Doctor Mehmet Oz, candidate for U.S. Senate in Pennsylvania, reportedly co-authored a book with the head of a university controlled by the Chinese Communist Party (CCP), which touted the benefits of traditional Chinese medicine that has seen pushback in the West over the years.
author: Jacob Bliss
title: Report: Mehmet Oz Co-Authored Book Touting Controversial Medicine With CCP-Backed Academic
